leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 实验室自动化-机器人与设备集成生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 驱动→编排→记录→监控→审计
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 设备接口 + 调度 + 监控

tools.name: LImBuS
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Biobank Information Management System (BIMS)
tools.detailed_description: A standards-compliant Biobank Information Management System developed for managing biological samples and associated data in research environments.

tools.name: AnIML Schemas
tools.one_line_profile: XML schemas and XSLT tools for Analytical Information Markup Language
tools.detailed_description: Provides the XML schema definitions and XSLT transformation tools for AnIML, a standard for storing and sharing analytical chemistry data.

tools.name: chatBIS
tools.one_line_profile: Conversational AI assistant for openBIS research data management system
tools.detailed_description: A RAG-based conversational AI tool that interfaces with the openBIS ELN/LIMS system to provide natural language query capabilities for research data management.

tools.name: iskylims
tools.one_line_profile: LIMS for Next Generation Sequencing sample management
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Laboratory Information Management System specifically designed for managing NGS samples, statistics, reports, and bioinformatics analysis services.

tools.name: Baobab LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source LIMS for biobanking
tools.detailed_description: A Laboratory Information Management System tailored for biobanking, managing biospecimen lifecycles and associated data.

tools.name: Bika LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Laboratory Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: A widely used open-source LIMS platform supporting various laboratory disciplines with sample tracking and management capabilities.

tools.name: allotropy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for converting instrument data to Allotrope Simple Model (ASM)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by Benchling to convert raw data from various laboratory instruments into the standardized Allotrope Simple Model (ASM) format.

tools.name: Biobank Web Application
tools.one_line_profile: Web interface for biobank management
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application for managing biobank operations, working in conjunction with biorepository systems.

tools.name: Biobank
tools.one_line_profile: Biorepository application for tracking biospecimens
tools.detailed_description: A core biorepository application designed for tracking and managing biospecimens in a biobank environment.

tools.name: LISTER
tools.one_line_profile: Metadata extraction tool for eLabFTW experiments
tools.detailed_description: A workflow and tool designed to extract metadata from reusable, pre-annotated eLabFTW experiment entries to support FAIR research data management.

tools.name: ECPL Control Platform
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time interferometric measurement and control for additive manufacturing
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based software platform for real-time measurement and feedback control of Exposure Controlled Projection Lithography (ECPL) additive manufacturing systems.

tools.name: Chemotion ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Electronic Lab Notebook for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) designed specifically for chemistry, supporting reaction planning, data storage, and research documentation.

tools.name: Chemotion Repository
tools.one_line_profile: Repository system for chemical samples and reactions
tools.detailed_description: The repository component of the Chemotion ecosystem, designed for publishing and sharing chemical samples, reactions, and related research data.

tools.name: CIDataFileReaderAPI
tools.one_line_profile: API for reading Crystal Instruments data files
tools.detailed_description: An API for reading signal and recording files (.ATFX and .DAT) generated by Crystal Instruments' EDM software, facilitating data integration and analysis.

tools.name: sequenticon
tools.one_line_profile: DNA sequence identicon generator
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating visual identicons (fingerprints) for DNA sequences, aiding in quick visual identification and verification of sequences.

tools.name: FAIRmat AreaA Data Modeling
tools.one_line_profile: ELN custom schemas and data modeling tools for synthesis experiments
tools.detailed_description: A collection of schemas and Jupyter notebooks for modeling synthesis experiment data within Electronic Lab Notebooks, developed by the FAIRmat consortium.

tools.name: pyelabdata
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for eLabFTW data access
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that simplifies accessing and managing data stored in the eLabFTW Electronic Lab Notebook.

tools.name: ot2-controller
tools.one_line_profile: SiLA 2 compliant controller for Opentrons OT-2 liquid handling robots
tools.detailed_description: A software controller that enables SiLA 2 compliance for the Opentrons OT-2 liquid handling robot, facilitating integration into standardized lab automation workflows.

tools.name: panda-controller
tools.one_line_profile: SiLA 2 compliant controller for Franka Emika Panda robot arms
tools.detailed_description: A C++ controller implementing the SiLA 2 standard for the Franka Emika Panda robot arm, enabling its use in standardized laboratory automation environments.

tools.name: sila-orchestrator
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic SiLA 2 client for coordinating lab services
tools.detailed_description: A SiLA 2 client application designed to discover and coordinate various SiLA 2 compliant laboratory services and devices.

tools.name: SPICE
tools.one_line_profile: SiLA Provider Implementation Community Equipment
tools.detailed_description: A reference implementation and toolkit for creating SiLA 2 (Standard in Lab Automation) providers, facilitating the integration of lab equipment.

tools.name: BaseSpace_Clarity_LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: API libraries and tools for BaseSpace Clarity LIMS
tools.detailed_description: A collection of API libraries and custom tools for interacting with Illumina's BaseSpace Clarity LIMS, enabling automation of genomic workflows.

tools.name: LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Laboratory Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: A basic Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) implemented in Perl for managing lab samples and data.

tools.name: LabGUI
tools.one_line_profile: Data collection and visualization for low temperature physics
tools.detailed_description: A modular tool designed for collecting and visualizing experimental data, specifically tailored for the requirements of low temperature physics laboratories.

tools.name: LeafLIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source Laboratory Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: An open-source LIMS designed to help labs track samples and manage workflows. (Note: Project is no longer actively funded).

tools.name: LLM-ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of LLMs with Electronic Lab Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A workflow/tool for integrating Large Language Models (LLMs) with Electronic Lab Notebooks (ELNs) to enhance data management in materials science research.

tools.name: Linear_Inverse_Modeling
tools.one_line_profile: Linear Inverse Modeling (LIM) for climate data
tools.detailed_description: Scripts and tools to build and apply Linear Inverse Models (LIM) for climate and weather data analysis, developed by NOAA PSL.

tools.name: OLiMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source LIMS module for Odoo
tools.detailed_description: A Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) module built for the Odoo ERP platform, enabling integrated lab management.

tools.name: OpenSkipper
tools.one_line_profile: NMEA data integration and display for marine instruments
tools.detailed_description: Open source software for integrating, displaying, and logging NMEA 0183/2000 and AIS data from nautical instruments, useful for marine field data acquisition.

tools.name: pasta-eln
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) platform
tools.detailed_description: An Electronic Lab Notebook system designed for managing scientific data and research notes.

tools.name: mousetrap-os
tools.one_line_profile: Mouse-tracking plugin for OpenSesame
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the OpenSesame experiment builder that enables mouse-tracking for behavioral science experiments.

tools.name: Aquarium.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable fluid-structure interaction solver
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for differentiable fluid-structure interaction (FSI) solving, targeted at robotics and physics simulations.

tools.name: SimpleELN-Team
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Electronic Lab Notebook software
tools.detailed_description: An electronic lab notebook (ELN) designed to facilitate the organization, storage, and sharing of scientific data and research notes.

tools.name: any2eln
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to convert various data formats into the ELN file format archive
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based utility designed to convert data from various sources into the .eln (Electronic Lab Notebook) archive format, facilitating data interoperability in laboratory environments.

tools.name: VevestaX
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight library for tracking machine learning experiments and exploratory data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library that enables data scientists to track machine learning experiments, log features and parameters, and manage exploratory data analysis (EDA) artifacts directly into GitHub/Bitbucket.

tools.name: ACTS
tools.one_line_profile: A Common Tracking Software toolkit for high-energy physics particle track reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: An experiment-independent toolkit for charged particle track reconstruction in high-energy physics experiments. It provides modern, thread-safe implementations of tracking algorithms.

tools.name: Aim
tools.one_line_profile: An open-source experiment tracking tool for logging and comparing machine learning training runs
tools.detailed_description: A supercharged open-source experiment tracker that provides a performant UI for exploring and comparing thousands of training runs, including metrics, hyperparameters, and images.

tools.name: Mandala
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment tracking framework focusing on computational graph storage and memoization
tools.detailed_description: A Python experiment tracking framework that integrates persistence logic directly into the code, allowing for automatic storage and retrieval of function calls and their results to enable incremental computing and reproducibility.

tools.name: Aquarium
tools.one_line_profile: A laboratory operating system for managing workflows, inventory, and protocols in synthetic biology
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Lab Operating System designed to manage laboratory workflows, inventory, and execution protocols, particularly suited for synthetic biology and automated labs.

tools.name: gP2S
tools.one_line_profile: A Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) specifically designed for Cryo-EM facilities
tools.detailed_description: A LIMS designed to track samples and grids through the Cryo-Electron Microscopy workflow, managing data from sample preparation to data collection.

tools.name: Ogama
tools.one_line_profile: Open Gaze and Mouse Analyzer for recording and analyzing eye-tracking and mouse-tracking data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source software for conducting eye-tracking and mouse-tracking experiments, providing features for recording, analyzing, and visualizing gaze data.

tools.name: SageMaker Experiments
tools.one_line_profile: SDK for tracking, organizing, and comparing machine learning experiments on Amazon SageMaker
tools.detailed_description: A library that allows data scientists to track, organize, and compare machine learning experiments, managing metadata and artifacts within the Amazon SageMaker ecosystem.

tools.name: Bika Health
tools.one_line_profile: Health laboratory extension for the Bika LIMS open source laboratory information management system
tools.detailed_description: An extension for Bika LIMS tailored for health laboratories, adding functionalities specific to clinical and healthcare data management.

tools.name: Bika LIMS Legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Open source web-based Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS)
tools.detailed_description: A legacy version of the Bika LIMS platform, designed to manage laboratory samples, experiments, and data workflows. It provides a web-based interface for tracking samples through their lifecycle in a laboratory setting.

tools.name: MetaLIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Simple open-source LIMS for small metagenomic labs
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Laboratory Information Management System specifically designed for small metagenomic laboratories to manage samples and sequencing data.

tools.name: animl-py
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning tools for analyzing ecological camera trap data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing machine learning functions to classify subjects within camera trap field data, handling both images and videos for ecological research.

tools.name: animl-r
tools.one_line_profile: R package for analyzing ecological camera trap data with ML
tools.detailed_description: The R implementation of the Animl toolkit, designed for classifying subjects in camera trap images and videos using machine learning models.

tools.name: Determined
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source deep learning training platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform for distributed deep learning training, hyperparameter tuning, and experiment tracking, widely used in scientific machine learning workflows.

tools.name: liminal-orm
tools.one_line_profile: ORM toolkit for Benchling schema management
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) library designed to synchronize and manage Benchling (LIMS) schemas and downstream dependencies, facilitating data integration in biotech workflows.

tools.name: elabapi-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python client library for eLabFTW API v2
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for interacting with the eLabFTW Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) API, enabling programmatic access to lab data and automation of ELN tasks.

tools.name: elabapy
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for eLabFTW API interaction
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to interact with the eLabFTW Electronic Lab Notebook API, facilitating data retrieval and management for laboratory workflows.

tools.name: eLabFTW
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN)
tools.detailed_description: A web-based Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for research labs, allowing researchers to track experiments, manage inventory, and collaborate on scientific data.

tools.name: MLTraq
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment tracking tool for ML & AI
tools.detailed_description: A tool to track, organize, and collaborate on Machine Learning and AI experiments, supporting scientific reproducibility and data management in computational research.

tools.name: Indigo ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Open source electronic lab notebook for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) designed for chemists to create, store, and manage chemical experiments and data.

tools.name: PyGaze
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source toolbox for eye tracking experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for programming eye tracking experiments, supporting various eye trackers and providing a unified interface for visual stimulus presentation and data collection.

tools.name: maggot
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight library for tracking numerical experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to help researchers keep track of numerical experiments, managing configuration and results.

tools.name: obsidian-eln
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic Lab Notebook based on Obsidian
tools.detailed_description: A configuration and workflow setup to use the Obsidian markdown editor as an Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for scientific research.

tools.name: obsidian-eln-plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin for Obsidian Electronic Lab Notebook
tools.detailed_description: A companion plugin for Obsidian to enhance its functionality as an Electronic Lab Notebook, providing specific features for researchers.

tools.name: LabTablet
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic Laboratory Notebook for Android
tools.detailed_description: An Android-based Electronic Laboratory Notebook (ELN) developed by FEUP InfoLab for recording experiment data on tablets.

tools.name: overreact
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for creating and analyzing chemical microkinetic models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to create and analyze chemical microkinetic models derived from computational chemistry data.

tools.name: trackio
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight experiment tracking library
tools.detailed_description: A local-first experiment tracking library for machine learning experiments, developed by Gradio/Hugging Face.

tools.name: Guild AI
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment tracking and ML developer tools
tools.detailed_description: An open source tool for running, tracking, and comparing machine learning experiments.

tools.name: Laboratory Management System
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based Laboratory Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: A web application for managing laboratory information, including diagnostics and patient data management.

tools.name: ClinViro
tools.one_line_profile: LIMS for HIV genotypic resistance testing
tools.detailed_description: An open source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) specifically designed for laboratories performing HIV genotypic resistance tests.

tools.name: hololinked
tools.one_line_profile: Data acquisition and IoT framework for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for data acquisition and IoT, designed to simplify the connection and control of laboratory instruments and sensors.

tools.name: Intel Experiments
tools.one_line_profile: Experiments API for tracking on Kubernetes
tools.detailed_description: An API and toolset for tracking machine learning experiments, designed to work within Kubernetes environments.

tools.name: jeelizPupillometry
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time web-based pupillometry library
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for real-time pupillometry (measurement of pupil diameter) in the web browser using a webcam, suitable for cognitive science experiments.

tools.name: scimax-eln
tools.one_line_profile: Emacs Org-mode based Electronic Lab Notebook
tools.detailed_description: A repository exploring and configuring Emacs and org-mode to function as a feature-rich Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for scientists.

tools.name: LabelFCSChannels
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to fix FCS channel names and descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for post-acquisition processing of Flow Cytometry Standard (FCS) files to fix or modify channel names and descriptions.

tools.name: LaminDB
tools.one_line_profile: A data framework for biology managing data lineage, storage, and metadata
tools.detailed_description: LaminDB is a data framework specifically designed for biology, providing functionality for data query, traceability, reproducibility, and FAIR principles. It integrates features of a lakehouse, lineage tracking, feature store, ontologies, LIMS, and ELN into a single API.

tools.name: bein
tools.one_line_profile: Miniature LIMS and workflow manager for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: Bein is a lightweight Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) and workflow manager tailored for bioinformatics. It helps researchers manage data processing pipelines and track analysis steps in a laboratory setting.

tools.name: Parkour2
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) for NGS sequencing facilities
tools.detailed_description: Parkour2 is a LIMS developed by the Max Planck Institute, specifically designed to support the workflows of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) facilities, managing samples, requests, and sequencing data.

tools.name: django-lab-inventory
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based inventory management system for research laboratories
tools.detailed_description: A Django-based application for managing laboratory inventory, developed by the Meliza Lab. It allows research groups to track chemicals, equipment, and supplies.

tools.name: MISO LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source LIMS for NGS sequencing centres
tools.detailed_description: MISO (Managing Information for Sequencing Operations) is an open-source Laboratory Information Management System specifically designed for Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) centres to track samples and sequencing metadata.

tools.name: NASA Data Acquisition System (NDAS)
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated suite for managing the complete data acquisition lifecycle at NASA
tools.detailed_description: NDAS is a LabVIEW-based application suite developed by NASA for managing the entire data acquisition lifecycle, including acquisition, processing, calibration, display, recording, and distribution of scientific data.

tools.name: Open-LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS)
tools.detailed_description: A web-based Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) designed to manage laboratory samples, experiments, and workflows.

tools.name: Sumatra
tools.one_line_profile: Automated electronic lab notebook for computational projects
tools.detailed_description: A tool for managing and tracking projects based on numerical simulation and/or analysis, supporting reproducible research by capturing code, data, and environment configuration.

tools.name: LRAUV Simulation
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation packages for Tethys-class Long-Range AUV
tools.detailed_description: Simulation environment and packages for the MBARI Tethys-class Long-Range Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (LRAUV), used for marine robotics research.

tools.name: OpenMRS-SENAITE Integration
tools.one_line_profile: Integration routes between OpenMRS and SENAITE LIMS
tools.detailed_description: Camel routes facilitating data exchange and integration between OpenMRS (Medical Record System) and SENAITE (Laboratory Information Management System).

tools.name: Ozone HIS
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Health Information System distribution including LIMS
tools.detailed_description: Software distribution for Ozone HIS, which integrates LIMS and EMR components for clinical and laboratory data management.

tools.name: PeakLimsApi
tools.one_line_profile: Source-available Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS)
tools.detailed_description: A fair-code licensed LIMS designed for laboratory sample and workflow management.

tools.name: ploomber-engine
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for executing and managing Jupyter notebooks in scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for Jupyter notebooks providing capabilities for testing, experiment tracking, debugging, and profiling, enhancing reproducibility in scientific computing.

tools.name: sklearn-evaluation
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning model evaluation and experiment tracking tool
tools.detailed_description: A library for evaluating machine learning models with plots, tables, and HTML reports, facilitating experiment tracking and analysis in scientific ML workflows.

tools.name: Zebra
tools.one_line_profile: Lab resource inventory and reservation system
tools.detailed_description: A system for managing laboratory resource inventory and handling reservations, facilitating lab logistics.

tools.name: QBiC ETL Scripts
tools.one_line_profile: ETL scripts for openBIS data ingestion
tools.detailed_description: Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) scripts developed by QBiC for processing and ingesting data into openBIS dropboxes.

tools.name: PyGriffinLim
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Griffin-Lim algorithm for audio reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing the Griffin-Lim algorithm for reconstructing audio signals from magnitude spectrograms, used in signal processing research.

tools.name: reef-pi
tools.one_line_profile: Open source reef tank controller and environmental monitor
tools.detailed_description: A modular controller based on Raspberry Pi for automating and monitoring reef tank environments (temperature, lighting, pH, etc.), applicable in marine biology labs.

tools.name: Alkabot
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source aquarium alkalinity monitor
tools.detailed_description: An automated device and software for monitoring alkalinity levels in aquatic environments, useful for water quality analysis.

tools.name: VRP Benchmarks Checker
tools.one_line_profile: Solution checker for Vehicle Routing Problems
tools.detailed_description: A tool for verifying solutions to Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problems with Time Windows (CVRPTW) and Pickup and Delivery Problems (PDP), supporting operations research.

tools.name: UniversaLIS
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory Information System (LIS) for clinical analyzers
tools.detailed_description: A Laboratory Information System (LIS) designed to interface with ASTM/CLSI-compliant clinical laboratory analyzers via serial and TCP connections.

tools.name: RSpace Python Client
tools.one_line_profile: Python SDK for RSpace Electronic Lab Notebook API
tools.detailed_description: A Python client library for interacting with the RSpace Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) API, enabling programmatic data access and integration.

tools.name: open_enventory
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical inventory and Electronic Lab Notebook for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A PHP/MySQL-based system combining chemical inventory management and an Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN), specifically tailored for chemistry laboratories.

tools.name: Sequencescape
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS)
tools.detailed_description: A LIMS developed by the Sanger Institute for tracking samples and managing workflows in high-throughput sequencing laboratories.

tools.name: SciNote Web
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN)
tools.detailed_description: A web-based Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for managing laboratory work, experimental data, and inventory.

tools.name: SENAITE ASTM
tools.one_line_profile: ASTM middleware for connecting laboratory instruments to SENAITE LIMS
tools.detailed_description: A middleware solution that enables communication between laboratory instruments and the SENAITE LIMS using the ASTM protocol, facilitating automated data acquisition.

tools.name: SENAITE CORE
tools.one_line_profile: Core logic for the SENAITE Enterprise Laboratory Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: The core component of the SENAITE LIMS, providing the fundamental logic and framework for managing laboratory samples, analyses, and workflows in a web-based environment.

tools.name: SENAITE Health
tools.one_line_profile: Healthcare laboratory extension for SENAITE LIMS
tools.detailed_description: An extension for SENAITE LIMS tailored for healthcare laboratories, adding capabilities for managing clinical data and workflows.

tools.name: SENAITE LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Meta-package and distribution for the SENAITE Laboratory Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: The main distribution package for SENAITE LIMS, bundling the core system and essential dependencies for deploying a complete laboratory management solution.

tools.name: SENAITE Patient
tools.one_line_profile: Patient management module for SENAITE LIMS
tools.detailed_description: A module for SENAITE LIMS that provides functionality for handling patient information, essential for clinical and diagnostic laboratories.

tools.name: SENAITE Storage
tools.one_line_profile: Sample storage management add-on for SENAITE LIMS
tools.detailed_description: An add-on for SENAITE LIMS that enables the management of physical storage locations for laboratory samples, such as freezers and shelves.

tools.name: NionSwift eLabFTW Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin connecting NionSwift microscopy software with eLabFTW ELN
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for NionSwift that allows users to manage and upload their electron microscopy experiment metadata directly to the eLabFTW electronic lab notebook.

tools.name: Labelme (shuyucool fork)
tools.one_line_profile: Image annotation tool for Mask-RCNN training data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic tagging and preparation of image data for training Mask-RCNN models, facilitating computer vision tasks in scientific research.

tools.name: HASS WeatherLink
tools.one_line_profile: Integration for Davis Instruments WeatherLink stations in Home Assistant
tools.detailed_description: A component that integrates Davis Instruments' WeatherLink and AirLink weather stations with Home Assistant, enabling environmental data acquisition and monitoring.

tools.name: EyeLoop
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based eye-tracker for dynamic closed-loop experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python 3-based eye-tracking system tailored for dynamic, closed-loop experiments using consumer-grade hardware, suitable for behavioral research.

tools.name: Reef Pi HASS Custom
tools.one_line_profile: Reef Pi integration for Home Assistant
tools.detailed_description: A custom integration to connect Reef Pi, an open-source reef tank controller, with Home Assistant for environmental monitoring and automation.

tools.name: TerrariumPI
tools.one_line_profile: Environmental control system for terrariums/aquariums using Raspberry Pi
tools.detailed_description: A complete software platform for automating and monitoring enclosed environments like terrariums and aquariums using Raspberry Pi, suitable for biological experiments.

tools.name: Jekyll Lab Notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) theme for Jekyll
tools.detailed_description: A full-featured theme for Jekyll designed to function as an Electronic Lab Notebook, allowing researchers to publish and manage their lab notes and data.

tools.name: Animl Frontend
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for viewing and labeling camera trap data
tools.detailed_description: The frontend interface for the Animl platform, enabling researchers to view, manage, and label image data collected from camera traps for ecological research.

tools.name: VS Code DVC
tools.one_line_profile: VS Code extension for Data Version Control (DVC)
tools.detailed_description: An extension for Visual Studio Code that integrates Data Version Control (DVC), facilitating machine learning experiment tracking and data versioning workflows directly in the editor.

tools.name: TruLens
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation and tracking tool for LLM experiments
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for evaluating and tracking experiments with Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI agents, providing metrics and feedback for model improvement.

tools.name: elAPI
tools.one_line_profile: Python API client for eLabFTW Electronic Lab Notebook
tools.detailed_description: An extensible Python client library for interacting with the eLabFTW Electronic Lab Notebook API, facilitating automation and data integration.

tools.name: NEMO
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory logistics and equipment management web application
tools.detailed_description: A web-based laboratory logistics application developed by NIST for scheduling reservations, controlling tool access, and tracking maintenance issues in research facilities.

tools.name: NexusLIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory Information Management System for microscopy facility data
tools.detailed_description: A Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) developed by NIST for the Nexus Microscopy Facility. It automates the collection, organization, and management of experimental data and metadata from electron microscopes, facilitating data tracking and reproducibility in microscopy research.

tools.name: NoteDeLN
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for experiment documentation
tools.detailed_description: An Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) software designed to replace paper notebooks in scientific laboratories. It allows researchers to record, organize, and manage experimental data and notes digitally.
